entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Summerside
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:41 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Summerside 06:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
Temperature: -6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: -7.1°C
Wind: E 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
